# Laundromat - Self-Service Laundry in Athens, Greece

> Laundromat is a modern self-service laundry located in Athens, Greece.
> We offer fast, easy, and affordable laundry solutions with state-of-the-art equipment.

## About

Laundromat provides self-service laundry facilities in multiple locations across Athens.
Our services include washing, drying, and special cleaning for all types of fabrics.

## Services

- Self-Service Laundry
- Wash and Dry
- Special Cleaning (blankets, duvets, curtains)
- Express Service

## Locations

- **Athens Center**: Ioulianou 50, Athens 104 34
- **Glyfada**: Grigoriou Lampraki 56, Glyfada 166 75
- **Marousi**: Kifisias Avenue 120, Marousi 151 25

## Contact

- Website: https://laundromat.gr
- Email: info@laundromat.gr
- Phone: +88006001441
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/laundromatgr

## Hours

Open daily: 07:00 - 00:00
